page.title: 09COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: {Telephone.} Most houses in our block have a telephone.The telephone is the main way we have of communicating with others. There are two telephone boxes in our block. {Postal Service.} There is a post office in East Hanney and every house has mail delivered to their door. {Media.} Newspapers give us information and tell us news,the television gives us news and entertains us. {Messages.} Citizen band radio isn't just for fun, they are also ways of communicating with others. Several people in Hanney have C.B.rigs.
